# code-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                                                           | Type                             | Default    |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `appearance` | `appearance` | The appearance of the button (`basic` \| `flat` \| `stroked`). The default is `flat`. | `"basic" \| "flat" \| "stroked"` | `'flat'`   |
| `disabled`   | `disabled`   | If `true`, the user cannot interact with the button.                                  | `boolean`                        | `false`    |
| `label`      | `label`      | The label text of the button.                                                         | `string`                         | `''`       |
| `type`       | `type`       | The type of the button (`button` \| `submit`). The default is `button`.               | `"button" \| "submit"`           | `'button'` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                                | Type                |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------- |
| `buttonClick` | Emitted when the user click on the button. | `CustomEvent<void>` |
